channel.title: Lil' help on compiles
channel.description: ok..when i open compiler says this.. [code]'javac' is not a recognised as and internal or external command operal by a batch server press any key to continue....[/code] ok..so whats with that? i am trying to make a pimpscape hamachi server..this is the stuff inside the compiler [code][@echo off title Pimpscape Compiler javac *.java pause/code] can u help me?[/code]

item.title: Lil' help on compiles
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Put anything you want in that ‘urservername’ space, all it does is change the title of the window.

Seriously, thats all it does.

Read full topic

item.title: Lil' help on compiles
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

when its says urserver name here is it for eg. trickyscape or pimpscape?

Read full topic

item.title: Lil' help on compiles
item.dc:creator: @oh_yeah oh yeah
item.description:
@oh_yeah wrote:

This is what u need to put in compile.bat:

@echo off
title —ur servername here—
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

this is what u need to put in runserver.bat:

@echo off
title —ur servername here—
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

u need to change “—ur servername here” with the name of ur server. like: TestScape

u need to have java JDK 5.0 update 9 for running ur compile.bat and runserver.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Lil' help on compiles
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

ok…when i open compiler says this…

'javac' is not a recognised as and internal or external command operal by a batch server press any key to continue....
ok…so whats with that? i am trying to make a pimpscape hamachi server…this is the stuff inside the compiler

[@echo off title Pimpscape Compiler javac *.java pause/code] can u help me?

Read full topic
